attributes.action: Recommend CAPTAIN TOM for a knighthood before his 100th Birthday x
attributes.additional_details: Put the petition in front of decision makers that decide on knighthoods
attributes.background: I would like CAPTAIN TOM recommended for a knighthood in addition to his letter from the Queen for his 100th Birthday

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
